reagents.mix_phrase: The solution shows signs of life, forming shapes!
reagents.name: Booster Enzyme

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution burns, leaving behind a lifeless mass!
reagents.name: Denatured Enzyme

reagents.mix_phrase: The water somehow seems purified. Or maybe defiled.
reagents.name: Holy Water

reagents.mix_phrase: Stinging vapors rise from the solution.
reagents.name: Calomel

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture knits together into a fibrous, bloody mass.
reagents.name: Synthetic Flesh

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture congeals into a bloody mass.
reagents.name: Meat Slurry

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture solidifies, taking a crystalline appearance.
reagents.name: Beff

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture reduces into a fine crystalline powder and an unbelievably delicious smell wafts upwards.
reagents.name: Enriched MSG

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off significant heat.
reagents.name: Chlorine Triflouride

reagents.mix_phrase: The resultant gel begins to emit significant heat.
reagents.name: Pyrosium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture pops and crackles before settling down.
reagents.name: Stable Sorium

reagents.mix_phrase: The begins to glow in a dark purple.
reagents.name: Stable Liquid Dark Matter

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture explodes with a big bang.
reagents.name: Sorium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture implodes suddenly.
reagents.name: Liquid Dark Matter

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture turns an offensive brown colour and begins fizzing.
reagents.name: Bilk

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a nice brown color.
reagents.name: Chocolate Milk

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a nice pink color.
reagents.name: Strawberry Milk

reagents.mix_phrase: A vague smell similar to tofu rises from the mixture.
reagents.name: Lipolicide

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture curdles up.
reagents.name: Cheese

reagents.mix_phrase: The disgusting mixture sloughs together horribly, emitting a foul stench.
reagents.name: Weird Cheese

reagents.mix_phrase: The sugar dissolves into the lemon juice.
reagents.name: Lemonade

reagents.mix_phrase: The tea and lemonade combine without much fuss.
reagents.name: Half and Half

reagents.mix_phrase: The eggs nog together. Pretend that \"nog\" is a verb.
reagents.name: Eggnog

reagents.mix_phrase: The tea sweetens. Visually. Somehow.
reagents.name: Sweet Tea

reagents.mix_phrase: The tea somehow smells even nicer than before.
reagents.name: Tea

reagents.mix_phrase: The citrus juices begin to blend together.
reagents.name: Triple Citrus

reagents.mix_phrase: You die a little inside after making that.
reagents.name: Sex on the Beach

reagents.mix_phrase: The vodka and orange juice mix together nicely.
reagents.name: Screwdriver

reagents.mix_phrase: The vodka and tomato juice mix together nicely.
reagents.name: Bloody Mary

reagents.mix_phrase: The blood feverishly tries to escape the burn of the vodka, but eventually succumbs.
reagents.name: Bloody Scary

reagents.mix_phrase: The drinks and chemicals mix together, emitting a potent smell.
reagents.name: Suicider

reagents.mix_phrase: The bourbon and ectoplasm mix together, forming a HORRIFYING BLEND.
reagents.name: BOOrbon

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance mixes together, emitting a rank piratey odor and seemingly dissolving some of the container...
reagents.name: Grog

reagents.mix_phrase: The beer is filled briefly by thousands of brilliant, tiny electrical arcs before growing calm and dark.
reagents.name: Beepskybräu Security Schwarzbier

reagents.mix_phrase: The alcohol burn sneakily disguises itself in the sweet and sour mix.
reagents.name: Whiskey Sour

reagents.mix_phrase: The rum pairs nicely with the sugar and lime.
reagents.name: Daiquiri

reagents.mix_phrase: James Bond would be proud.
reagents.name: Martini

reagents.mix_phrase: James Bond would be ashamed.
reagents.name: Vodka Martini

reagents.mix_phrase: The unmistakable smell of a power lunch wafts from the container.
reagents.name: Manhattan

reagents.mix_phrase: You shed a single patriotic tear as the drink comes together.
reagents.name: Space-Cuba Libre

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixed drink starts fizzing on its own. Somehow.
reagents.name: Gin Fizz

reagents.mix_phrase: The gin attempts to hide its pine cone flavor in the lime juice.
reagents.name: Gimlet

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink turns a bright pink.
reagents.name: Cosmopolitan

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink comes together and swiftly infuriates cocktail nerds.
reagents.name: Vodka Gimlet

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink turns a deep brown as the coffee settles in.
reagents.name: Black Russian

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink abides.
reagents.name: White Russian

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink turns a rich brown and smells like a hangover.
reagents.name: Irish Coffee

reagents.mix_phrase: A tiny mushroom cloud erupts from the container. That"s not worrying at all!
reagents.name: Dragon"s Breath

reagents.mix_phrase: The tonic water and gin mix together perfectly.
reagents.name: Gin and Tonic

reagents.mix_phrase: The tonic water and vodka mix together perfectly.
reagents.name: Vodka Tonic

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink turns electric blue and starts quivering violently.
reagents.name: Gin and Sonic

reagents.mix_phrase: The gin and tonic gets even more bitter. Way to go!
reagents.name: Pink Gin and Tonic

reagents.mix_phrase: The coffee, tonic, and vodka separate into dangerously drinkable layers.
reagents.name: Mind Eraser

reagents.mix_phrase: The cocktail gets back to basics.
reagents.name: Old Fashioned

reagents.mix_phrase: A nicely Jamaican smell wafts out of the container.
reagents.name: Planter's Punch

reagents.mix_phrase: A little pink umbrella magically appears in the drink.
reagents.name: Mai Tai

reagents.mix_phrase: The ghosts of starlets past waft by.
reagents.name: Jean Harlow

reagents.mix_phrase: Dude. Dude. You"re, like, a genius.
reagents.name: Gin and Chronic

reagents.mix_phrase: The tequila and citrus pair together like old, alcoholic friends.
reagents.name: Margarita

reagents.mix_phrase: James Bond would be deeply confused.
reagents.name: Tequini

reagents.mix_phrase: The hot sauce and tequila mix to create a frat boy"s worst nightmare.
reagents.name: Prairie Fire

reagents.mix_phrase: The coffee and tequila mix together. Liqueur? Who needs it?
reagents.name: Brave Bull

reagents.mix_phrase: The frightening amount of liquor in the container balances out with the cola and sours.
reagents.name: Long Island Iced Tea

reagents.mix_phrase: The frightening amount of liquor in the container balances out with the lemon juice and sours.
reagents.name: Long Beach Iced Tea

reagents.mix_phrase: The chunks of tomato paste hang in the bourbon and cola as an emulsion. It looks as horrible as that sounds.
reagents.name: Hunchback

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink gives off the smell of a rainy beach.
reagents.name: Piña Colada

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink fizzes as the pulp settles to the top.
reagents.name: Mimosa

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink fizzes and turns a dark gold.
reagents.name: French 75

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink turns a deep red and gives off a hit of sweetness.
reagents.name: Negroni

reagents.mix_phrase: The drink gives off a haunting stench! What did you make?
reagents.name: Necroni

reagents.mix_phrase: The fuel is filtered through the bread and makes something vaguely consumable.
reagents.name: Squeeze

reagents.mix_phrase: A minty and refreshing smell drifts from the effervescent mixture.
reagents.name: Antihol

reagents.mix_phrase: The orange juice turns an unsettlingly vibrant shade of green.
reagents.name: Ecto Cooler

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture explodes!
reagents.name: Potassium Explosion

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture explodes!
reagents.name: Barium Explosion

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture explodes!
reagents.name: Magnesium Explosion

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture settles into a white powder.
reagents.name: Magnesium Chloride

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance mixes into a clear, viscous liquid.
reagents.name: Silicate

reagents.mix_phrase: An iridescent black chemical forms in the container.
reagents.name: Oil

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance turns neon green and bubbles unnervingly.
reagents.name: Unstable mutagen

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance turns a drab green and begins to bubble.
reagents.name: Stable mutagen

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a faint scent of almonds.
reagents.name: Cyanide

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a colorless, odorless liquid.
reagents.name: Sarin

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles and gives off an unpleasant medicinal odor.
reagents.name: Phenol

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture crystallizes.
reagents.name: Salicylic Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution mixes into a reddish-brown powder.
reagents.name: Thermite

reagents.mix_phrase: Slightly dizzying fumes drift from the solution.
reagents.name: Space Drugs

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance turns a striking cyan and becomes oily.
reagents.name: Space Lube

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
reagents.name: Sulfuric Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
reagents.name: Hydrochloric Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture deepens to a dark blue, and slowly begins to corrode its container.
reagents.name: Fluorosulfuric Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution settles calmly and emits gentle fumes.
reagents.name: Potassium Iodide

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance becomes very still, emitting a curious haze.
reagents.name: Pentetic Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: It smells like a bad hangover in here.
reagents.name: Acetaldehyde

reagents.mix_phrase: It smells like vinegar and a bad hangover in here.
reagents.name: Acetic Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a pungent odor, which makes you tired.
reagents.name: Ether

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture fizzles into a colorless liquid.
reagents.name: Cyclopentanol

reagents.mix_phrase: This pungent odor could probably melt steel.
reagents.name: Kerosene

reagents.mix_phrase: Ugh, it smells like the morgue in here.
reagents.name: Embalming fluid

reagents.mix_phrase: The chemicals mix into an odd pink slush.
reagents.name: Haloperidol

reagents.mix_phrase: A strong and cloying odor begins to bubble from the mixture.
reagents.name: Burn Medication

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a fine black powder.
reagents.name: Activated Charcoal

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture turns an odd lavender color.
reagents.name: Teporone

reagents.mix_phrase: Tiny white crystals precipitate out of the solution.
reagents.name: Epinephrine

reagents.mix_phrase: A horrid smell like something died drifts from the mixture.
reagents.name: Atropine

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture settles, becoming a milky white.
reagents.name: Oculine

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles slowly, making a slightly sweet odor.
reagents.name: Mannitol

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution bubbles freely, creating a head of bluish foam.
reagents.name: Salbutamol

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture rapidly turns into a dense pink liquid.
reagents.name: Perfluorodecalin

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution yields an astringent powder.
reagents.name: Styptic Powder

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution fizzes and gives off toxic fumes.
reagents.name: Ephedrine

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution fizzes and gives off toxic fumes.
reagents.name: Methamphetamine

reagents.mix_phrase: A foul astringent liquid emerges from the reaction.
reagents.name: Mutadone

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution bubbles softly.
reagents.name: Cryoxadone

reagents.mix_phrase: A light layer of frost forms on top of the mixture.
reagents.name: Cryostylane

reagents.mix_phrase: The solvent extracts an antibiotic compound from the fungus.
reagents.name: spaceacillin

reagents.mix_phrase: An unpleasant, shifting green mass of liquid forms from the reaction.
reagents.name: Strange Toxin

reagents.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the unpleasant milky substance.
reagents.name: initropidril

reagents.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the royal purple substance.
reagents.name: royal initrobeedril

reagents.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the golden substance.
reagents.name: initrobeedril

reagents.mix_phrase: A sweet and sugary scent drifts from the unpleasant milky substance.
reagents.name: initropidril

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to fizz.
reagents.name: cola

reagents.mix_phrase: The chemicals hiss and fizz briefly before falling still.
reagents.name: Flash Powder

reagents.mix_phrase: The chemicals catch fire, burning brightly and violently!
reagents.name: Flash

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to bubble slighly!
reagents.name: Hootingium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to bubble furiously!
reagents.name: Hootingium

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance violently detonates!
reagents.name: Chlorine Azide

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance violently detonates!
reagents.name: CLF3 + FF Explosion

reagents.mix_phrase: null
reagents.name: Anima

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance becomes sticky and extremely warm.
reagents.name: Phlogiston

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance becomes a pile of burning dust.
reagents.name: Phlogiston Dust

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance erupts into wild flames.
reagents.name: Phlogiston Fire

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture congeals into a sticky gel.
reagents.name: Napalm

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture sets into a greyish powder!
reagents.name: Smoke Powder

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture quickly turns into a pall of smoke!
reagents.name: Smoke

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a granular black powder.
reagents.name: Black Powder

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes a yellow liquid!
reagents.name: Stabilising Agent

reagents.mix_phrase: A white crystalline residue forms as the water boils off.
reagents.name: potash

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture yields a white crystalline compound.
reagents.name: potash

reagents.mix_phrase: A white crystalline substance condenses out of the mixture.
reagents.name: saltpetre

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture ferments into a filthy morass.
reagents.name: Jenkem

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a harsh odor.
reagents.name: Atrazine

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture forms into a blue crystalline solid.
reagents.name: Copper Nitrate

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a biting odor.
reagents.name: Nitrogen Dioxide

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off a sharp acidic tang.
reagents.name: Nitric Acid

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes colorless.
reagents.name: Allyl chloride

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives of a garlic-like odor.
reagents.name: Epichlorohydrin

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles.
reagents.name: Glycerol

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes seemingly heavy and viscous.
reagents.name: Nitroglycerin

reagents.mix_phrase: A head of foam results from the mixture"s constant fizzing.
reagents.name: Foam surfactant

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles gently.
reagents.name: Firefighting foam

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture quickly and violently erupts into bubbles!
reagents.name: Foam

reagents.mix_phrase: The metal begins to foam up!
reagents.name: Metal Foam

reagents.mix_phrase: The metal begins to foam up, becoming rigid and tough!
reagents.name: Iron Foam

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles, emitting an acrid reek.
reagents.name: Ammonia

reagents.mix_phrase: A horrible smell pours forth from the mixture.
reagents.name: Diethylamine

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture turns a rather unassuming color and settles.
reagents.name: Lysergic acid diethylamide
Bath Salts
reagents.mix_phrase: Tiny cubic crystals precipitate out of the mixture. Huh.
The mixture congeals and dries up, leaving behind an abrasive powder.
reagents.name: Itching Powder

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture fizzes gently.
reagents.name: Diphenhydramine

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture gives off quite a stench.
reagents.name: Sulfonal

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution crystallizes with a brief flare of light.
reagents.name: Salt

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture hisses oddly.
reagents.name: Cat Drugs

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture bubbles and gives off a sharp odor.
reagents.name: Boiled Pee

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture violently reacts, leaving behind a few crystalline shards.
reagents.name: Crank

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture dries into a pale blue powder.
reagents.name: Krokodil

reagents.mix_phrase: Ick, this stuff really stinks. Sure does make the container sparkle though!
reagents.name: Space cleaner
Strange Reagent
reagents.mix_phrase: The substance begins moving on its own somehow.
The substance turns thick and stiff, yet soft.
reagents.name: Carpet

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture emits a burnt, oily smell.
reagents.name: Partially Hydrogenated Space-Soybean Oil

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture forms a viscous, clear fluid!
reagents.name: Corn Syrup

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture emits a sickly-sweet smell.
reagents.name: Very-High-Fructose Corn Syrup

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance thickens and takes on a meaty odor.
reagents.name: Gravy

reagents.mix_phrase: The beff and the synthflesh combine to form a smoky red log.
reagents.name: Pepperoni

reagents.mix_phrase: The smell of paint thinner assaults you as the solution bubbles.
reagents.name: Acetone

reagents.mix_phrase: The liquid becomes slightly hairy.
reagents.name: Hairgrownium

reagents.mix_phrase: The liquid becomes disgustingly furry and smells terrible.
reagents.name: Super Hairgrownium

reagents.mix_phrase: The liquid darkens and emits a strong smell of alcohol.
reagents.name: Port

reagents.mix_phrase: The smell of death wafts from the solution.
reagents.name: Capulettium

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution begins to slosh about violently by itself.
reagents.name: Capulettium Plus

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution swirls violently and forms...something.
reagents.name: Something

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution settles into a liquid form of electricity.
reagents.name: Voltagen

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution emits a tutti frutti stench.
reagents.name: Energy Drink

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution settles into a liquid form of electricity but violently destabilizes!
reagents.name: Voltagen Arc

reagents.mix_phrase: The ants begin to rapidly mutate!
reagents.name: Fermid

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance begins to wriggle disgustingly and climbs out of its container!
reagents.name: Life

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance burbles distressingly and takes a metallic shine.
reagents.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Alpha

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance flashes brilliantly, but quickly subsides.
reagents.name: Werewolf Serum Precursor Beta

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a putrid stench!
reagents.name: Imperfect Werewolf Serum

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance bubbles and gives off an almost lupine howl.
reagents.name: Werewolf Serum

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a coppery stink.
reagents.name: Vampire Serum Omega

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance flashes multiple colors and emits the smell of a pocket protector.
reagents.name: colorful reagent

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture swirls around excitedly!
reagents.name: fliptonium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture swirls around and begins to glow strangely!
reagents.name: glowing fliptonium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture swirls around in a kinda lackluster way. You feel pretty unimpressed.
reagents.name: diluted fliptonium

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance makes a little "toot" noise and starts to smell pretty bad.
reagents.name: fartonium

reagents.mix_phrase: "The substance turns an airy sky-blue and foams up into a new shape."
reagents.name: flaptonium

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture becomes far more fabulous!
reagents.name: glitter

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a terrible stench. Are those maggots?
reagents.name: rotting

reagents.mix_phrase: The substance gives off a lovely scent!
reagents.name: pure love

reagents.mix_phrase: The solution settles and congeals into a strange viscous fluid that seems to have the properties of both a liquid and a gas.
reagents.name: stable bose-einstein macro-condensate

reagents.mix_phrase: A tiny point of light blooms within the material, and quickly grows to envelop the entire container. Your life flashes before your eyes.
reagents.name: quark-gluon plasma

reagents.mix_phrase: null
reagents.name: NI3 Explosion

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture forms a clear greenish liquid, emitting a nauseating smell reminiscent of chlorophyll and rubbing alcohol.
reagents.name: Rajaijah

reagents.mix_phrase: The ants arachnify. What?
reagents.name: spiders

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture starts to rapidly fizzle and heat up.
reagents.name: thalmerite heating

reagents.mix_phrase: The mixture begins to rapidly freeze.
reagents.name: cryostylane chilling
